lan.coinect_describe2: A fast, convenient, secure vending machine mobile payment solution
lan.coinect_describe3: Both MDB version and impulse Version
lan.coinect_describe4: Compatible with 99% of self-service vending devices
lan.coinect_title2_icon1_describe: No need of mainboard modification, no need of extra screen installation, plug and play
lan.coinect_title2_icon2_describe: Accomplish member identification, promotion, top up, transaction checking and other management functions through merchant platform

lan.about_describe1: Counect mission is to connect any possibility by integrating IOT and cloud computing technology in retail industry.
lan.about_describe2: Counect philosophy is balancing less and more - a simple implementation and a powerful service is almost always the best for client. Counect offer simple mobile payment and sales auditing IOT, and powerful multi-channel sales performance management SaaS.
lan.about_describe3: Counect invented and patented 27 technologies servicing more than 5,000,000 customers at more than 50,000 POS each month. Counect developed 4 vertical cloud services processing more than 6,000,000 payments each month in more than 300 cities in 7 countries. Counect R&D is still driven by the technical challenges and imagination.
lan.about_describe4: Counect team is a group of highly skilled and dedicated individuals that thrive on both solving problems and exploring unconnected territories.
